name: VR Wild Safari Tour
description:
Beautiful dense jungle environment with trees make the VR Wild Safari Tour even more thrilling! If you play jungle games, forest games, animal games, 3d driving games, off-road jungle games or jungle animal games then this game is the best forest roller coaster game 3d. VR Wild Safari Tour is a game for everyone!
It’s a magical kingdom rush game for children and a fun-filled 3D ride game for elders. Be ready for a car mountain ride to explore the Jurassic jungle rollercoaster fun. Watch Jurassic jungle dinosaurs, huge elephants, stags, roaring lions, zebras and many other birds in VR tour of safari jungle coaster.
